definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: There among that dusty disorder, would you care to play hide - and - seek ?
sentences.chinese: 灰尘铺满零乱的书斋，歌儿呵，你可愿在那里捉迷藏？

sentences.english: His books are all over the place.
Review whole bedroom, profusion colour is wanton jump move, harmonious and not messy.
sentences.chinese: 纵观整个居室，缤纷色彩肆意跃动，和谐而不零乱。

sentences.english: I swam in the subtle fragrance drag, accompanied by a lonely soul chaotic dance.
sentences.chinese: 我在暗香里游曳，孤独的灵魂伴着零乱的舞步。

sentences.english: Sallow and emaciated, firm flower plait, but is very confused, the facial expression be diffused.
sentences.chinese: 面黄肌瘦，扎着花辫，却甚是零乱，表情苍茫。
速度降低，如文件的零乱。

sentences.english: Gelt is what your bankers and mortgage holders need .
sentences.chinese: 零乱是你的银行家和抵押持有人的需要。

sentences.english: Lights from hurricane lamps flickering about in the pine forest created the scene of a star-studded sky.
sentences.chinese: 松林中射来零乱的风灯，都成了满天星宿。

sentences.english: Computer wires behind the desk are very messy as well.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的电线也是十分的零乱，一点都不雅观。

sentences.english: Is the desk messy or neat?

sentences.chinese: 房子零乱地散布在乡间。

definition: variant of 斑駁|斑驳[ban1 bo2]
variant of 繚亂|缭乱[liao2 luan4]
in a mess/scattered about/in complete disorder
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
